issue.title: [CF 807] TMW_Options lua error
issue.body:
Sorry, i forgot how this happened.

1x integer overflow attempting to store 105174121827
<in C code>
TellMeWhen-r803\Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r803.lua:2648: in function "GetRealNames"
<string>:"*:OnEvent":8: in function <string>:"*:OnEvent":1
<string>:"*:OnEnter":2: in function <string>:"*:OnEnter":1

comments.body:
Added in some more proper error messages for this. Happens when you check a spellID in an icon that is larger than 2^31-1. It looks to me like you were checking Hand of Gul'dan and Roll but missed the semicolon between them.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
